scenario_text.value:
Everyone’s still with us, right? We need to
hurry out of the castle!

What’s going on? Why is everyone on the
ground? I... I didn’t want this!
Everyone watch out for the rubble!

No, wait! Stop! Everyone’s fallen down... We
have to help...

Miu, I’m sorry. I’d like to help, but we need
to get out of here.
We’re almost out. Everyone be on your guard!

*sniff* *sob*... Even out here, so many of
them are hurt... Is this all my fault?

Miu, close your eyes! Here, I’ll hold your
hand instead of Kaito!
If we can just get through this...!
